summary: This bill, the LGBTQ+ Panic Defense Prohibition Act of 2025, aims to amend Title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit the use of the "panic defense" in federal criminal cases. This defense attempts to excuse or mitigate crimes based on the victim's sexual orientation, gender identity, or gender expression.  The bill includes findings detailing the negative impacts of such defenses and mandates an annual report from the Attorney General on related prosecutions.
